room_title: Escape room "Presidential Treasure" by The Lock Houston in Houston
review: We had a great time with the Presidential Room. Our host Tessa was very good and helpful during the game - we thought the walkie talkie worked fine and they gave us updates on our timing. We almost solved the last clue - next time!

room_title: Escape room "Presidential Treasure" by The Lock Houston in Houston
review: Had fun working through the clues with the family! Almost solved the Oval Office - just a few clues short!

room_title: Escape room "Presidential Treasure" by The Lock Houston in Houston
review: We were on our last clue in the Presidential Room and because one of the clues was backwards, we didn't make it. However, we truly enjoyed ourselves and are planning on going back to try another room.
